comment:
* An AlteredCharSequence is a CharSequence that is largely mirrored from
 * another CharSequence, except that a specified range of characters are
 * mirrored from a different char array instead.
 *
 * @deprecated The functionality this class offers is easily implemented outside the framework.

methods.name: public static AlteredCharSequence make(CharSequence source, char[] sub, int substart, int subend)
methods.comment: * Create an AlteredCharSequence whose text (and possibly spans) * are mirrored from source, except that the range of * offsets substart inclusive to subend exclusive * are mirrored instead from sub, beginning at offset 0.

methods.name: void update(char[] sub, int substart, int subend)
public CharSequence subSequence(int start, int end)
public void getChars(int start, int end, char[] dest, int off)

methodNames: public static AlteredCharSequence make(CharSequence source, char[] sub, int substart, int subend)
void update(char[] sub, int substart, int subend)
public CharSequence subSequence(int start, int end)
public void getChars(int start, int end, char[] dest, int off)
